item.title: Conway's Game Of Life In 298 Characters Of Julia
item.description: Yesterday I got distracted playing around with Julia and ended up making this little Conway’s Game of Life. Would fit into a tweet if not for the pretty-printing / animation loop!. Works using matrix operations. Parameters by line (uppercase are matrices): d = size of board (dxd). S game / map state in 1 and 0 values for on/off. U = shift board up if left-multiplied, right if right-multiplied. D = down, left.
